Packages that use Breathability
com.alvermont.terraj.stargen Contains all the code for the Stargen and Dole accretion libraries.

 Breathability Enviro.getBreathability(Planet planet)
          This function uses figures on the maximum inspired partial pressures of Oxygen, other atmospheric and traces gases as laid out on pages 15, 16 and 18 of Dole's Habitable Planets for Man to derive breathability of the planet's atmosphere.
